goals__remit: Central Europe Energy Partners (CEEP) is an association of energy and energy-intensive companies, organisations and scientific institutions from Central European countries. It was established in June 2010, and now has 11 members from 4 countries, which are employing more than 100,000 employees, and an overall revenue of Euros 20 billion (see the activities of CEEP on the website: www.ceep.be).
